message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Think carefully, the value of the money decreases with each round!
I understand the value decreases Alice, but so does fairness.  I propose a 55/45 split, reflecting that this is my only chance to propose.
The value is decreasing Bob, let's be realistic. I'll take a slight loss from my original offer and split 55/45 in my favor. It's the last chance for a decent deal!
